idx_customers_email_org_unique.name: idx_customers_email_org_unique
idx_customers_email_org_unique.where: "customers"."email" IS NOT NULL AND "customers"."deleted_at" IS NULL

idx_customers_account_org_unique.name: idx_customers_account_org_unique
idx_customers_account_org_unique.where: "customers"."account_number" IS NOT NULL AND "customers"."deleted_at" IS NULL

idx_products_barcode_org_unique.name: idx_products_barcode_org_unique
idx_products_barcode_org_unique.where: "products"."barcode" IS NOT NULL AND "products"."deleted_at" IS NULL

api_tokens_org_isolation.name: api_tokens_org_isolation

api_tokens_owner_access.name: api_tokens_owner_access
api_tokens_owner_access.using:
user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE auth_id = auth.uid())
        OR EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM users
          WHERE auth_id = auth.uid()
          AND role IN ('owner', 'admin')
          AND organization_id = api_tokens.organization_id
        )
